translations.The given name is too long: The given name is too long
translations.The given web address is too long: The given web address is too long
translations.The given web address is not a valid URL: The given web address is not a valid URL
translations.The given legal notice address is too lo: The given legal notice address is too long
translations.The given legal notice address is not a: The given legal notice address is not a valid URL
translations.The given privacy policy address is too: The given privacy policy address is too long
translations.The given privacy policy address is not: The given privacy policy address is not a valid URL
translations.The given slogan is too long: The given slogan is too long
translations.Disable-user-theming should be true or f: Disable-user-theming should be true or false
translations.The uploaded file exceeds the upload_max: The uploaded file exceeds the upload_max_filesize directive in php.ini
translations.The uploaded file exceeds the MAX_FILE_S: The uploaded file exceeds the MAX_FILE_SIZE directive that was specified in the HTML form
translations.The file was only partially uploaded: The file was only partially uploaded
translations.Could not write file to disk: Could not write file to disk
translations.A PHP extension stopped the file upload: A PHP extension stopped the file upload
translations.You are already using a custom theme. Th: You are already using a custom theme. Theming app settings might be overwritten by that.
translations.The PHP module \"imagick\" is not enable: The PHP module "imagick" is not enabled although the theming app is. For favicon generation to work correctly, you need to install and enable this module.
translations.The PHP module \"imagick\" in this insta: The PHP module "imagick" in this instance has no SVG support. For better compatibility it is recommended to install it.
translations.Dark theme with high contrast mode: Dark theme with high contrast mode
translations.Similar to the high contrast mode, but w: Similar to the high contrast mode, but with dark colours.
translations.A dark theme to ease your eyes by reduci: A dark theme that is soothing for your eyes (by reducing the overall luminosity and brightness).
translations.OpenDyslexic is a free typeface/font des: OpenDyslexic is a free typeface/font designed to mitigate some of the common reading errors caused by dyslexia.
translations.A high contrast mode to ease your naviga: A high contrast mode to ease your navigation. Visual quality will be reduced but clarity will be increased.
translations.Theming makes it possible to easily cust: Theming makes it possible to easily customise the look and feel of your instance and supported clients. This will be visible for all users.
translations.Instead of a background image you can al: Instead of a background image you can also configure a plain background color. If you use a background image changing this color will influence the color of the app menu icons.
translations.Upload new background and login image: Upload new background and login image
translations.Install the ImageMagick PHP extension wi: Install the ImageMagick PHP extension with support for SVG images to automatically generate favicons based on the uploaded logo and colour.
translations.Name: Name
translations.a safe home for all your data: a safe home for all your data
translations.The primary color is used for highlighti: The primary color is used for highlighting elements like important buttons. It might get slightly adjusted depending on the current color schema.
translations.Although you can select and customize yo: Although you can select and customize your instance, users can change their background and colors. If you want to enforce your customization, you can toggle this on.
translations.Enable blur background filter (may incre: Enable blur background filter (may increase GPU load)
translations.Customization has been disabled by your: Customization has been disabled by your administrator
translations.Set a primary color to highlight importa: Set a primary color to highlight important elements. The color used for elements such as primary buttons might differ a bit as it gets adjusted to fulfill accessibility requirements.
translations.The background can be set to an image fr: The background can be set to an image from the default set, a custom uploaded image, or a plain color.
translations.In some cases keyboard shortcuts can int: In some cases keyboard shortcuts can interfere with accessibility tools. In order to allow focusing on your tool correctly you can disable all keyboard shortcuts here. This will also disable all available shortcuts in apps.
translations.Universal access is very important to us: Universal access is very important to us. We follow web standards and check to make everything usable also without mouse, and assistive software such as screenreaders. We aim to be compliant with the {guidelines}Web Content Accessibility Guidelines{linkend} 2.1 on AA level, with the high contrast theme even on AAA level.
translations.If you find any issues, do not hesitate: If you find any issues, do not hesitate to report them on {issuetracker}our issue tracker{linkend}. And if you want to get involved, come join {designteam}our design team{linkend}!
translations.Select a background from your files: Select a background from your files
translations.You can configure the app order used for: You can configure the app order used for the navigation bar. The first entry will be the default app, opened after login or when clicking on the logo.
translations.The default app can not be changed becau: The default app can not be changed because it was configured by the administrator.
translations.The app order was changed, to see it in: The app order was changed, to see it in action you have to reload the page.
translations.Could not set the app order: Could not set the app order
translations.Could not reset the app order: Could not reset the app order
The default app is the app that is e.g. opened after login or when the logo in the menu is clicked.
translations.If an app is not enabled for a user, the: If an app is not enabled for a user, the next app with lower priority is used.
translations.Could not set global default apps: Could not set global default apps
